events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and assigned to the Engineering cluster for further evaluation based on your skills and experience.
A recruiter specializing in software development roles has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process.
The initial screening call went well, where we discussed your technical background and your motivation to work with our engineering team.
You have responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about proceeding to the technical interview stage.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 6th at 2 PM UTC to further assess your software engineering capabilities.
You completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and a solid understanding of software development principles.
The HR interview has been arranged to discuss your fit within the company culture and to talk about benefits and other employment details.
